title: Lamucaa
address: Multiple locations: Calle del Prado 16, Plaza Carlos Cambronero 4, and more
knownFor: Good for groups, everything is for sale (even the furniture!)
description: Modern informal restaurant chain with unique concept: 'Eat well and take the furniture with you' - everything is for sale. Menu features veal carpaccio, chicken curry, burgers, grilled fish, pasta, and gourmet pizzas. Multiple locations across Madrid.
